name: Sky Climbers
description: Sky Climbers will challenge your VR parkour abilities, while you play through this linear platforming adventure game. Along the way you will run into a few creatures and friends who may help you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-6500 or AMD Ryzen 1500 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX580 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or AMD Ryzen 1700 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
